item.title: 0xF8CB Pi TV - Lock HDMI Configuration
item.description: One of my raspberries is connected to the TV (quite original!) running RetroPie with Kodi as well. Every now and then, power fails. When restored, the Pi always came up with messed up resolution. I would just reboot it once again and everything would be fine, so I postponed looking into. Turns out it was one of those things you delay because you think it will take forever to understand but in the end takes 5min…
